message.content: Now I can see the three code review comments from Gemini Code Assist. Let me address them systematically. First, let me check the current backend code to fix the performance issue:

content:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py:
   880	        # Invalidate cache for the feed's tab, as feed properties (name, url) have changed.
   881	        invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
   882	        logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after updating feed {feed.id}.")
   883	
   884	        # Trigger update to fetch new items using the already fetched feed data
   885	        try:
   886	            if parsed_feed:
   887	                # Reuse the already fetched and parsed feed data to process entries,
   888	                # avoiding a redundant network call.
   889	                process_feed_entries(feed, parsed_feed)
   890	        except Exception as update_e:
   891	            # Log error during update but don't fail the operation
   892	            logger.error(f"Error updating feed {feed.id} after URL change: {update_e}", exc_info=True)
   893	        
   894	        logger.info(f"Updated feed {feed_id} from '{original_url}' to '{new_url}'.")
   895
